outline.text: Option A Pricing (applicable to Generators who do not elect Option B Pricing)
For all waste up to 100 cubic feet, other than Irradiated Hardware, Large Components, and
For all applicable waste in excess of 100 cubic feet:  Use Maximum Uniform Rate Schedule
For Irradiated Hardware, Large Components, and Sealed Sources:  Use Maximum Uniform
For all applicable waste that does not exceed by 20% the Volume Projection provided by the
For any applicable waste that exceeds the Volume Projection by 20%:   Use Maximum
Irradiated Hardware and High Dose Shipments (See Note B):  Pricing will be calculated on a
Steam Generators and Other Large Components (See Note C):  Pricing will be calculated on a
Sealed sources:  Not eligible for Option B pricing.  Use Maximum Uniform Rate Schedule.
